title: Madrid
text:
A trip that was 3 years in the planning. In 2022 Spain was awarded the World Rogaining Championships which I wiulkd need to attend if still President of the International Rogaining Federation so planning and saving began……

Hola - we now live in Spain for 2 months.

### Vuelta a Madrid

title: The Rain in Spain
text:
Matt & Ann go to Espanya and Catalunya, and get lost.

July and August 2025 we travel to Spain for the World Rogaining Championships and the World Masters Orienteering Championships. In between we’ve decided to live and work from Girona, Catalunya for 6 weeks and experience all the things.
